column4: BRIEF-Microsoft appoints Kevin Scott as chief technology officer
column5: * Scott joins Microsoft's senior leadership team  reporting directly to Microsoft chief executive officer Satya Nadella

column4: UPDATE 1-BlackRock to ask if companies spend cash from tax holiday on growth
column5: Jan 24 BlackRock Inc will scrutinize how companies plan to use the cash they bring back to the United States as part of a tax holiday backed by U.S. President Donald Trump  CEO Larry Fink said in a letter distributed on Tuesday.

column4: BRIEF-U.S. appeals court refuses to reconsider Microsoft email ruling
column5: * U.S. appeals court refuses to reconsider decision forbidding government from forcing Microsoft to turn over emails stored on non-U.S. servers--order

column4: BlackRock to ask if companies spend cash from tax holiday on growth
column5: Jan 24 BlackRock Inc will scrutinize how companies plan to use the cash they bring back to the United States as part of a tax holiday backed by U.S. President Donald Trump  CEO Larry Fink said in a letter distributed on Tuesday.

column4: German regulator clears HERE stake purchases by Intel  NavInfo
column5: DUESSELDORF  Germany  Jan 24 Germany's Federal Cartel Office said on Tuesday it had approved stake purchases in German digital mapping firm HERE by U.S. chip maker Intel  and China's NavInfo.
